headliner.title: Soluciones de software rápidas, seguras y de alta calidad.
headliner.desc: FemDevs es una empresa de desarrollo de software dedicada a proporcionar soluciones de software de alta calidad a pequeñas empresas y particulares. Nuestros productos están diseñados para ser rápidos, seguros y fiables desde el primer día.

api.title: APIs
api.desc: Nuestras APIs están diseñadas para ser rápidas y fáciles de usar, y son ideales para cualquier aplicación que necesite acceso a datos en tiempo real.

website.title: Sitios Web
website.desc: Nuestros sitios web están diseñados para ser rápidos, seguros y fiables, y son ideales para cualquier empresa que necesite una presencia en línea.

bot.title: Bots de Discord
bot.desc: Nuestros bots de Discord están diseñados para ser fáciles de usar y personalizar, y son ideales para cualquier servidor de Discord que necesite un bot de moderación o entretenimiento.

database.title: Bases de Datos
database.desc: Nuestras bases de datos están diseñadas para ser rápidas, seguras y fiables, y son ideales para cualquier aplicación que necesite almacenar y recuperar datos en tiempo real.

one.title: Escalabilidad
one.desc: Nuestros productos están diseñados para ser escalables, lo que significa que pueden crecer con su empresa a medida que su empresa crece.

two.title: Tecnología de Vanguardia
two.desc: Utilizamos la última tecnología para garantizar que nuestros productos sean rápidos, seguros y fiables desde el primer día.

three.title: Soporte 24/7
three.desc: Nuestro equipo de soporte está disponible las 24 horas del día, los 7 días de la semana para ayudarle con cualquier pregunta o problema que pueda tener.

one.title: The Backstory
one.desc: FemDevs is a small software development company, founded in February 2023 by Alex and Oblong. We are based in the United States, and we are dedicated to providing high-quality software solutions to small businesses and individuals. We are passionate about what we do, and we are always looking to improve our products and services. Although, we didn't start like this. Let us take you back in time.

two.title: The Beginnings
two.desc: In February 2023, we started developing discord bot to manage a personal discord server known as "The Kingdom of Candia." This would be the first project that Alex and Oblong, as a team, would work on together. They would both learn a lot from this project, such as things about each other, about the open source community, and about the software development industry. This would be the project that would spark the creation of the FemDevs.

three.title: A New Challenger Appears
three.desc: A few days after the beginning of the project, a new team member would join the FemDevs, that being Benjamin. Benjamin was very skilled at programming, excelling at server-side development and database management. The team continued developing the bot in the initial language of Python, until Benjamin determined that it would be beneficial to switch to JavaScript. This would be the first of many decisions that would shape the future of the FemDevs.

four.title: The Present
four.desc: In July of 2023, we have helped over 12,000 people and started to sell high quality products. By the end of 2023, we have helped over 50,000 people. We have continued to grow and expand our services, and we are always looking for new ways to improve. We are excited to see what the future holds for FemDevs, and we are grateful for all of the support that we have received.

five.title: The Future
five.desc: We are always looking for new ways to improve our products and services, and we are excited to see what the future holds for FemDevs. We are dedicated to providing high-quality software solutions to small businesses and individuals, and we are always looking for new ways to expand our services. We are excited to see what the future holds for FemDevs, and we are grateful for all of the support that we have received.

team.desc:
FemDevs would not be possible without the help of a number of people.
We would like to thank the following people for their contributions to FemDevs.
